alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 13 at 11:04AM EDT until September 14 at 8:47AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Still River At Brookfield affecting Fairfield and Litchfield Counties. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Wed 10 am: 10.9 Forecast: Wed 5 pm 12.9 Wed 11 pm 12.7 Thu 5 am 11.6 Thu 11 am 10.7 Thu 5 pm 10.3 &&
